reg:regulation.reg:title: British Columbia Building Code Regulation
reg:regulation.reg:amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 9/2011, October 3, 2011]
reg:regulation.reg:prerevisednote: See section 3 (2) of the British Columbia Building Code Regulation, B.C. Reg. 264/2012 respecting the application of B.C. Reg 216/2006.

bcl:section.bcl:text: B.C. Reg. 295/98, the British Columbia Building Code Regulation, applies only to the construction or alteration of a building for which

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: a building permit described in Part 21 of the Local Government Act or Part 3 of the Community Charter is applied for before the effective date of this order,
the building permit applied for is issued and work commences and continues to completion without interruption, other than work stoppages considered reasonable in the building industry, and
all work is carried out in conformity with B.C. Reg. 295/98.

bcl:section.bcl:text: The National Building Code of Canada 2005, with the changes set out in the attached Schedule incorporated into it, are together adopted and establish the British Columbia Building Code.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Application of British Columbia Building Code
bcl:section.bcl:text: The British Columbia Building Code enacted by section 2 applies except insofar as B.C. Reg. 295/98 applies under section 1 of this order.
